casebody.data:
JAMES, et al.
v.
BARTLETT, et al. No. 602PA04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 18, 2005. Michael Crowell, Raleigh, Robert N. Hunter, Jr., Greensboro, for William James, et al. Susan K. Nichols, Alexander McC. Peters, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Gary Bartlett, et al. John R. Wallace, Joseph A. Newsome, Raleigh, for Atkinson and Cobb. Anita S. Earls, for Sumler, et al. Christopher G. Browning, Jr., Solicitor-General, for State. W. Wallace Respess, Jr., for Steve Troxler.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of January 2005 by Steve Troxler for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of January 2005."
